char_hp_2.description: All friendly units have -30% Max HP

global_costrecovery_1.description: Natural DP regeneration rate is reduced by 25%

global_costrecovery_2.description: Natural DP regeneration rate is reduced by 50%

char_sprecovery_1.description: All friendly units have -25% natural SP recovery rate

char_sprecovery_2.description: All friendly units have -50% natural SP recovery rate

global_squadnum_1.description: Max Squad size is reduced to 10 Operators

global_pcharnum_2.description: Deployed Unit Limit is reduced to 7

global_forbidloc_1.description: 4 tiles on the map will no longer allow units to be deployed upon them

global_forbidloc_2.description: 8 tiles on the map will no longer allow units to be deployed upon them

enemy_faust_snipemod_2.description: [Faust] has +40% ATK, +70% HP, +70% DEF; Faust's special snipe deals 280% damage and has a shorter cooldown

enemy_faust_trapmod_2.description: [Faust] has +20% ATK, +80% HP, +80% DEF, and will deploy Ballistas to assist in combat

enemy_faust_snipemod_3.description: [Faust] has +60% ATK, +110% HP, +110% DEF; Faust's special snipe deals 380% damage and has a shorter cooldown

enemy_faust_trapmod_3.description: [Faust] has +20% ATK, +130% HP, +130% DEF, and will deploy Ballistas to assist in combat and shorter Ballista deployment cooldown

enemy_reveng_1.description: All [Avengers] and [Hateful Avengers] have +50% HP, +60% DEF, +1 Weight level

enemy_reveng_aspdmod_2.description: All [Avengers] and [Hateful Avengers] have +80% HP, +90% DEF, +75 ASPD, +1 Weight level and their special effect activates at 75% HP

enemy_reveng_atkmod_2.description: All [Avengers] and [Hateful Avengers] have +80% HP, +90% DEF, +25% ATK, +1 Weight level, and an additional +50% ATK when their special effect is activated

enemy_reveng_aspdmod_3.description: All [Avengers] and [Hateful Avengers] have +120% HP, +130% DEF, +150 ASPD, +1 Weight level and immediately activates their special effect

enemy_reveng_atkmod_3.description: All [Avengers] and [Hateful Avengers] have +120% HP, +130% DEF, +50% ATK, +1 Weight level, and an additional +100% ATK when their special effect is activated

char_cost_attackers_1.description: The DP Cost of Sniper and Guard Operators is doubled

char_cost_casters_1.description: The DP Cost of Caster and Specialists Operators is doubled

char_cost_attackers_2.description: The DP Cost of Sniper and Guard Operators is tripled, and their Redeployment Time is increased by 50%

char_cost_casters_2.description: The DP Cost of Caster and Specialists Operators is tripled, and their Redeployment Time is increased by 50%
